headline: Ethical Health Care After Roe
description: Isaac Chotiner speaks with Louise Perkins King, a surgeon and bioethicist at Harvard and the vice-chair of ethics at the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists, about how bioethicists think about abortion, how the medical community should approach its own members who are opposed to abortion, and whether it is ever appropriate for medical-care providers to break the law.
description_zh-Hans: Isaac Chotiner与哈佛大学的外科医生和生物伦理学家、美国妇产科学院的伦理学副主席Louise Perkins King交谈，讨论生物伦理学家如何看待堕胎问题，医学界应如何对待自己反对堕胎的成员，以及医疗服务提供者违反法律是否合适。
description_zh-Hant: Isaac Chotiner與哈佛大學的外科醫生和生物倫理學家、美國婦產科學院的倫理學副主席Louise Perkins King交談，討論生物倫理學家如何看待墮胎問題，醫學界應如何對待自己反對墮胎的成員，以及醫療服務提供者違反法律是否合適。
